LRs
• 
Lexical Resources can be corpora, gazetteer, ontologies…
• 
Gazetteers are plain lists of entities grouped into categories. 
• 
E.g.: Location - European capital cities: Paris, Madrid, Berlin, etc.
• 
(Gazetteer PR to conduct Named Entity or key phrase Lookup)
GATE
